pull.title: build: add *_STANDARD vars to depends gen_id
pull.body:

verification.payload:
tree 0715f85873808b7e9ccc3e1bdafc977a98b131ac
parent 874529665c1c326fc86fc0d0d6c3512fab087ab8
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1655454825 +0100
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1655473489 +0100

build: add *_STANDARD vars to depends gen_id

Followup to #22380. We need to have these in the id so that we rebuild
if we change / unset a *_STANDARD.

events.message:
build: add *_STANDARD vars to depends gen_id

Followup to #22380. We need to have these in the id so that we rebuild
if we change / unset a *_STANDARD.

Post merge ACK

This was merged without confirming guix hashes, which I think is important to do with any build change.

> This was merged without confirming guix hashes, which I think is important to do with any build change.

These options aren't used in the Guix build, and have default values, so there isn't going to be a determinism issue. As long as one person had sanity-checked that the Guix build still completed, I don't think we needed to leave depends (caching) broken for any longer, to wait for someone else to maybe run a build.
@fanquake yeah I didn't mean that this should have waited for another guix build, just more of justification for posting my guix hashes now
